Welcome!

– About –

It’s so nice to see you here!

We are Busy Bee Studios, a creative center that get creative minds together. We offer classes and workshops every week in a very relaxed and friendly environment. Our aim is for everyone to learn new skills and technics while having fun. We have created a community of like-minded creators who enjoy chatting about their different project. We are very welcoming so don’t hesitate to pop in and join us.

A few words about the pottery class
Previous participants have created a diverse range of items, plates, bowls and vases! This workshop is very hands on with loads of tips so come along and get stuck in. You will learn about the properties of clay, how to centre, open and pull up the walls of your pot. You can choose up to three pots for firing : they will be fired twice and glazed. You will be able to collect your pieces usually two weeks after the class.
A few words about the drawing & painting class
The subjects of this class are quite varied, from life drawing to still life. You will experiment different styles and tools. You'll use a range of materials including pastel and acrylics to build rich layers and textures in your drawing and build simple compositions to capture the light and life in your subject. The class is structured around technical advice and group demonstrations with one to one tuition to enable everyone to take the subject to their own level.
A few words about the sewing & dressmaking class
The first part of this class usually consists of learning a new sewing technic and mastering it on different quarters of fabric before applying it to a pattern of your choice. We have a wide range of fabrics but if you want your own one, please do bring it along. You will learn a technic that is adapted to your level so that no-one is left struggling or bored! You will also spend time on creating your own patterns, adapting them to your size and body shape so that you can start creating your very own garments.
A few words about the flower arrangement class
Our wonderful tutor starts the class with a demonstration. You will then do your own variation of it with the flowers and greens of your choice while learning plenty of tips along the way. Although the theme is given, your own interpretation will give a unique twist to your composition, you'd be surprised to see how many different arrangements came out of this class. And of course you're more than welcome to take your creation home, just make sure you bring a large box to transport it.
A few words about the creativity class
This class is quite different from the others : we believe that creativity is something that we nourish on a daily basis. The goal of this class is to make you think outside the box and get ideas bubbling in your head! Each week, we pick a theme and you're free to explore new technics and media to answer the theme. Our participants really enjoy this very fun class and become more and more imaginative they've got over the weeks, so don't be shy give it a try!

Select a class time

– Details –

For everyone

Everyone is welcome, no matter your abilities we’ll make sure you have a good experience and go home with something you’ve created all by yourself.

Super flexible

So this week you have a meeting and can’t attend a class ? No problem at all, we know how life is, that’s why all our classes are priced individually. We also offer a card for 6 classes, to use on any of them, without any limit of time!

Materials ?

You don’t have to worry about any material, everything is provided for our classes so that you can just sit back, relax, and focus on your masterpiece.

Our Studio

Plenty of room to spread your creativity!

Our studio is based in Clevedon craft center. We have 3 airy rooms dedicated to our classes and workshops, as well as a lounge area where you can relax with a cup of tea and browse our library of books and magazines to find inspiration. Our kitchen is always filled with beautiful cakes that you're welcome to try.

In Summer, we install a few tables in our garden for you to chat about all those ideas buzzing in your head. Depending on the class or workshop and amount of people attending, we sometimes settle outside. We're also growing some blooms and greens for our flower arrangement classes.

Our Team

Mary Smith
Mary created the center in 2012. She had always wanted to find a place where creative people could learn from each others, share skills and ideas in a relaxed atmosphere. She took the opportunity to create her business when she moved to Bristol and hasn't looked back.
Terry Brown
Terry started a Pottery/Ceramic Course when he was 16. Over the years, he has developed various pottery techniques and specialised in ‘wheel work’. He has a real passion for it and loves sharing his knowledge with his students.
Hannah Peters
Hannah is a qualified Fine Art Practitioner, a Visual Artist and an Art Tutor. She studied contemporary fine art and passed with honours at Bristol University. She enjoys teaching at all skill level and revels in seeing her students gain confidence and knowledge.
Elise Diaz
Elise has been sewing from a very early age, initially being taught by her Grandmother, she has since completed a degree in Fashion Design. She runs a successful bridal and occasions wear business, designing bespoke pieces. She loves to share her professional tips with her students, helping them achieve the perfect garnment.
Lucy Kim
Lucy is an award-winning event florist. She shares her time between her business, running demonstrations all over UK and teaching in our wonderful studio. She has a huge knowledge of flowers and picks out the plants and flowers we grow with our gardener.
Mathilde Legrand
Mathilde is passionate about promoting good art practice, which she sees as a vital part of her role as a professional artist. She has extensive experience of developing creativity in beginners and more experienced artists.

– Testimonials –

Tom
Has been coming for 2 years
Always have a fantastic time with Terry, who talks us through the technics he will demonstrate and after some practice, on to make a new item. Leaving feeling very inspired, happy and ready for more. Just give it a go!!

– Testimonials –

Emma
Has been coming for 1 year
Professional, relaxed and fun! I was soon put at ease by the lovely workshop leader Lucy. The demonstration are very helpful, and there is a great variety of flower, greens and materials to use to create a unique flower arrangement. So pleased with the result every time!
